page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: ATTITUDES FAVOUR COUNTRY LIVING AND ARE COMPLETELY DIVORCED FROM URBAN LIFE. AN ELDERLY LADY HAVING SUFFERED A STROKE CLINGS TO HER COUNTRY COTTAGE RATHER THAN MOVE INTO A SMALL NEIGHBOURING VILLAGE. THE PLEASURES THESE PEOPLE ENJOY COME FROM LIVING CLOSE TO NATURE AND THE BEAUTY OF THEIR SURROUNDINGS. TO SOME, RELIGION IS IMPORTANT. RURAL ACTIVITIES ARE THE MAIN INTEREST, BUT THE PEOPLE ARE WELL INFORMED OF HAPPENINGS OUTSIDE THEIR OWN DISTRICT AND ARE GENEROUS IN DONATING TO CHARITABLE APPEALS AND INTERNATIONAL DISASTERS.
